s2.title: API Docs
s2.p: &XercesPName; comes packaged with API documentation for DOM - a common interface for programming XML. In addition the most common framework classes have also been documented.

The &XercesPName; DOM is an implementation of the Core Level 1 Document Object model as defined in the W3C Recommendation of 1 October, 1998. The W3C document is at
http://www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-DOM-Level-1-19981001/level-one-core.html
For a complete understanding of how the &XercesPName; APIs work, we highly encourage you to read the DOM Level 1 Specification mentioned above.

em.jump: Click here for the &XercesPName; DOM API documentation.
Click here for the &XercesPName; DOMPARSE API documentation.

s2.note: The API documentation is automatically generated by POD2HTML.pl, a Perl utility that processes the POD tags in the &XercesPName; source code.
